subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Unbeaten Uncle Mo, the 2-year-old champion and early Kentucky Derby favorite, was made the 1-5 favorite in a 10-horse field entered for the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
snippet: Unbeaten Uncle Mo, the 2-year-old champion and early Kentucky Derby favorite, was made the 1-5 favorite in a 10-horse field entered for the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
